Title: Face Wars
Plot: Sarah strongly believes that it is much easier to be a black person in America than it is to be a Jewish person. To prove her point she decides to become black for a day. Meanwhile, Brian and Steve get carried away smoking medical marijuana.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,sexual material and other content that may offend
GuestStars: Alex Desert, Beth Tapper, Henriette Mantel, Paul F. Tompkins, Karri Turner, Murray Gershenz, Eddie Pepitone, Chris Tallman, Justin Roiland, Rob Schrab, Susan Yeagley
